main event: An unidentified flying object was reported at Tyndall Air Force Base in Florida on February 26, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as elliptical and very bright, approximately the size of a grapefruit,The object was observed to ascend and descend vertically for approximately 10 minutes,It was first seen at an angle of 15° and azimuth 220°,The observers reported no sound from the object, and it disappeared suddenly on a horizontal flight path.
witness description: MSGT Henry J. Lacour, SGT Leggett, and SGT Maloney
